recipesJson.name: This ain't fool's gold tobacco
recipesJson.author: Trevorxgage
recipesJson.description:
Started off as trying to clone Foo's gold from Gaslight vapor POH line, while it follows the same profile it's not a clone, but it's damn good and perfect for the cooler months. 
Rich, smooth tobacco, creamy peanut butter, and oaty cookie notes to round it all out. Either with a cup of coffee in the morning or with some dessert after dinner it's a fantastic vape.

RF oatmeal cookie is the raw extract, not the VG concentrate

Notes in the November 2016 recipe thread
https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/5am6a3/november_2016_recipe_thread/d9st1dq/

reviews.text: A buddy of mine made a bottle of this for me. Currently vaping it now. You're right it's not like Foo's Gold, instead I get a delicious full flavored cigar with a creamy peanut butter exhale. TOP NOTCH! Well done Trevor. I will be ordering the needed flavors asap so I can have this in my daily rotation.
